text: Sloka Gora () is a small settlement north of Turjak in the Municipality of Velike Lašče in central Slovenia. The entire municipality is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Velike Lašče municipal site A small, relatively well preserved Early Iron Age hill fort with visible earthworks and settlement terraces can be seen near the settlement.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 16125 ==References== ==External links== *Sloka Gora on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Sloka Gora
